mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sport.baseball_data (GAME_ID, LEAGUE, GROUND, STADIUM, MATCH_DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK, MATCH_TIME, A_TEAM, B_TEAM) VALUES ( IFNULL(#{gameId},''), IFNULL(#{league},''), IFNULL(#{ground},''), IFNULL(#{stadium},''), IFNULL(#{date},''), IFNULL(#{dayOfWeek},''), IFNULL(#{time},''), IFNULL(#{aTeam},''), IFNULL(#{bTeam},'') ) ;
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM sport.baseball_data WHERE GAME_ID = IFNULL(#{gameId},'') ;
mapper.update:
UPDATE sport.baseball_data SET LEAGUE =IFNULL(#{league},''), GROUND =IFNULL(#{ground},''), STADIUM =IFNULL(#{stadium},''), MATCH_DATE =IFNULL(#{date},''), DAY_OF_WEEK =IFNULL(#{dayOfWeek},''), MATCH_TIME =IFNULL(#{time},''), A_TEAM_REST_DAY = IFNULL((SELECT DATEDIFF(IFNULL(#{date},'') ,(SELECT MATCH_DATE FROM (SELECT MATCH_DATE FROM sport.baseball_data A WHERE A_TEAM = IFNULL(#{aTeam},'') AND LEAGUE = IFNULL(#{league},'') AND A_TEAM_PITCHER = IFNULL(#{aTeamPitcher},'') AND MATCH_DATE < IFNULL(#{date},'') ORDER BY MATCH_DATE DESC LIMIT 1) A ))) -1,0), A_TEAM_PITCHER =IFNULL(#{aTeamPitcher},''), A_TEAM_PITCHER_HAND = IFNULL((SELECT HAND FROM sport.baseball_pitcher_hand_data B WHERE B.TEAM = #{aTeam} AND B.PITCHER = #{aTeamPitcher}),'0'), A_TEAM =IFNULL(#{aTeam},''), A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{aTeamTotalPoint},0), B_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT = IFNULL(#{bTeamTotalPoint},0), B_TEAM =IFNULL(#{bTeam},''), B_TEAM_PITCHER =IFNULL(#{bTeamPitcher},''), B_TEAM_PITCHER_HAND = IFNULL((SELECT HAND FROM sport.baseball_pitcher_hand_data B WHERE B.TEAM = #{bTeam} AND B.PITCHER = #{bTeamPitcher}),'0'), B_TEAM_REST_DAY = IFNULL((SELECT DATEDIFF(IFNULL(#{date},'') ,(SELECT MATCH_DATE FROM (SELECT MATCH_DATE FROM sport.baseball_data B WHERE B_TEAM = IFNULL(#{bTeam},'') AND LEAGUE = IFNULL(#{league},'') AND B_TEAM_PITCHER = IFNULL(#{bTeamPitcher},'') AND MATCH_DATE < IFNULL(#{date},'') ORDER BY MATCH_DATE DESC LIMIT 1) A ))) -1,0), HANDI_CAP = IFNULL(#{handiCap},0), HANDI_CAP_RESULT =IFNULL(#{handiCapResult},''), ODD =IFNULL(#{odd},''), POINT_LINE =IFNULL(#{pointLine},0), POINT_LINE_RESULT =IFNULL(#{pointLineResult},''), A_TEAM_THIRD_POINT =IFNULL(#{aTeamThirdPoint},0), B_TEAM_THIRD_POINT =IFNULL(#{bTeamThirdPoint},0), THIRD_HANDI_CAP =IFNULL(#{thirdHandiCap},0), THIRD_HANDI_CAP_RESULT =IFNULL(#{thirdHandiCapResult},''), THIRD_POINT_LINE =IFNULL(#{thirdPointLine},0), THIRD_POINT_LINE_RESULT =IFNULL(#{thirdPointLineResult},''), A_TEAM_FOURTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{aTeamFourthPoint},0), B_TEAM_FOURTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{bTeamFourthPoint},0), FOURTH_HANDI_CAP =IFNULL(#{fourthHandiCap},0), FOURTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT =IFNULL(#{fourthHandiCapResult},''), FOURTH_POINT_LINE =IFNULL(#{fourthPointLine},0), FOURTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT =IFNULL(#{fourthPointLineResult},''), A_TEAM_FIFTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{aTeamFifthPoint},0), B_TEAM_FIFTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{bTeamFifthPoint},0), FIFTH_HANDI_CAP =IFNULL(#{fifthHandiCap},0), FIFTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT =IFNULL(#{fifthHandiCapResult},''), FIFTH_POINT_LINE =IFNULL(#{fifthPointLine},0), FIFTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT =IFNULL(#{fifthPointLineResult},''), FIRST_STRIKEOUT =IFNULL(#{firstStrikeOut},''), FIRST_HOMERUN =IFNULL(#{firstHomerun},''), FRIST_BASEONBALL =IFNULL(#{firstBaseOnBall},''), FRIST_POINT =IFNULL(#{firstScore},0), SECEND_POINT =IFNULL(#{secondScore},0), THRID_POINT =IFNULL(#{thirdScore},0), FOURTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{fourthScore},0), FIFTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{fifthScore},0), SIXTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{sixthScore},0), SEVENTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{seventhScore},0), EIGHTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{eighthScore},0), NINTH_POINT =IFNULL(#{ninthScore},0),
HIT_COUNT =IFNULL(#{hitCount},0), BASEONBALL_COUNT =IFNULL(#{baseOnBallCount},0), ERROR_COUNT =IFNULL(#{errorCount},0),
EXTEND_POINT =IFNULL(#{extendScore},0), EXTEND_YN =IFNULL(#{extendYn},0 )
WHERE GAME_ID = IFNULL(#{gameId},'') AND LEAGUE = IFNULL(#{league},'') AND GROUND = IFNULL(#{ground},'') AND MATCH_DATE = IFNULL(#{date},'') AND A_TEAM = IFNULL(#{aTeam},'') AND B_TEAM = IFNULL(#{bTeam},'') AND UPDATE_YN = 1
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, GAME_ID, LEAGUE, GROUND, STADIUM, MATCH_DATE, DAY_OF_WEEK, MATCH_TIME, A_TEAM_REST_DAY, A_TEAM_PITCHER, A_TEAM_PITCHER_HAND, A_TEAM, A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT, B_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT, B_TEAM, B_TEAM_PITCHER, B_TEAM_PITCHER_HAND, B_TEAM_REST_DAY, HANDI_CAP, HANDI_CAP_RESULT, ODD, POINT_LINE, POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_THIRD_POINT, B_TEAM_THIRD_POINT, THIRD_HANDI_CAP, THIRD_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, THIRD_POINT_LINE, THIRD_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FOURTH_POINT, B_TEAM_FOURTH_POINT, FOURTH_HANDI_CAP, FOURTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FOURTH_POINT_LINE, FOURTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT, A_TEAM_FIFTH_POINT, B_TEAM_FIFTH_POINT, FIFTH_HANDI_CAP, FIFTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT, FIFTH_POINT_LINE, FIFTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT, FIRST_STRIKEOUT, FIRST_HOMERUN, FRIST_BASEONBALL, FRIST_POINT, SECEND_POINT, THRID_POINT, FOURTH_POINT, FIFTH_POINT, SIXTH_POINT, SEVENTH_POINT, EIGHTH_POINT, NINTH_POINT, HIT_COUNT, BASEONBALL_COUNT, ERROR_COUNT, EXTEND_POINT, EXTEND_YN FROM sport.baseball_data WHERE A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 ORDER BY MATCH_DATE, MATCH_TIME, LEAGUE, GAME_ID, GROUND DESC;
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO sport.baseball_summary (LEAGUE, TEAM, FILTER, CONDI, WIN_PER, LOSE_PER, HANDI_WIN_PER, HANDI_LOSE_PER, OVER_PER, UNDER_PER, THIRD_HANDI_WIN_PER, THIRD_HANDI_LOSE_PER, THIRD_OVER_PER, THIRD_UNDER_PER, FOURTH_HANDI_WIN_PER, FOURTH_HANDI_LOSE_PER, FOURTH_OVER_PER, FOURTH_UNDER_PER, FIFTH_HANDI_WIN_PER, FIFTH_HANDI_LOSE_PER, FIFTH_OVER_PER, FIFTH_UNDER_PER, FIRST_STRIKE_PER, FIRST_BALL_PER, FIRST_HOMERUN_PER) SELECT MATCHWIN.LEAGUE, MATCHWIN.A_TEAM,
'전체', 'all',
'홈/원정', MATCHWIN.GROUND,
'요일', MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK,
'정/역배', MATCHWIN.ODD,
'휴식일', MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
'투수', MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
WINPER, LOSEPER, FULLWINPER, FULLLOSEPER, FULLOVERPER, FULLUNDERPER, THIRDWINPER, THIRDLOSEPER, THIRDOVERPER, THIRDUNDERPER, FOURTHWINPER, FOURTHLOSEPER, FOURTHOVERPER, FOURTHUNDERPER, FIFTHWINPER, FIFTHLOSEPER, FIFTHOVERPER, FIFTHUNDERPER, STRIKEWINPER, BASEWINPER, HOMERUNWINPER FROM (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS winPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS losePer, NOW() FROM (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allHandiCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) winCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT > B_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99
GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE) MATCHWIN LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fullWinPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1),0) AS fullLosePer, IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fullOverPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fullUnderPer, NOW() FROM (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allHandiCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND HANDI_CAP_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99
GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) winCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 AND HANDI_CAP_RESULT !='적특' AND HANDI_CAP_RESULT ='승리' GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allPointCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND POINT_LINE_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) C ON A.A_TEAM = C.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = C.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = C.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = C.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = C.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = C.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = C.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) overCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND POINT_LINE_RESULT != '적특' AND POINT_LINE_RESULT = '오버' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )D ON A.A_TEAM = D.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = D.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = D.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = D.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = D.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = D.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = D.LEAGUE) HANDIWIN ON MATCHWIN.LEAGUE = HANDIWIN.LEAGUE AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM = HANDIWIN.A_TEAM
AND MATCHWIN.GROUND = HANDIWIN.GROUND
AND MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK = HANDIWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND MATCHWIN.ODD = HANDIWIN.ODD
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = HANDIWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER = HANDIWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS thirdwinPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS thirdlosePer, IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1), 0) AS thirdoverPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1), 0) AS thirdunderPer, NOW() FROM (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allHandiCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND THIRD_HANDI_CAP_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) winCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 AND THIRD_HANDI_CAP_RESULT != '적특' AND THIRD_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = '승리' GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allPointCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND THIRD_POINT_LINE_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) C ON A.A_TEAM = C.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = C.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = C.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = C.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = C.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = C.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = C.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) overCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND THIRD_POINT_LINE_RESULT != '적특' AND THIRD_POINT_LINE_RESULT ='오버' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )D ON A.A_TEAM = D.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = D.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = D.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = D.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = D.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = D.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = D.LEAGUE) THIRD ON MATCHWIN.LEAGUE = THIRD.LEAGUE AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM = THIRD.A_TEAM
AND MATCHWIN.GROUND = THIRD.GROUND
AND MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK = THIRD.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND MATCHWIN.ODD = THIRD.ODD
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = THIRD.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER = THIRD.A_TEAM_PITCHER
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fourthwinPer , 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fourthlosePer, IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fourthoverPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fourthunderPer, NOW() FROM (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allHandiCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FOURTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) winCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FOURTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT != '적특' AND FOURTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = '승리' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allPointCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FOURTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) C ON A.A_TEAM = C.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = C.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = C.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = C.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = C.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = C.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = C.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) overCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FOURTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT != '적특' AND FOURTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT = '오버' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )D ON A.A_TEAM = D.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = D.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = D.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = D.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = D.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = D.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = D.LEAGUE) FOURTH ON MATCHWIN.LEAGUE = FOURTH.LEAGUE AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM = FOURTH.A_TEAM
AND MATCHWIN.GROUND = FOURTH.GROUND
AND MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK = FOURTH.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND MATCHWIN.ODD = FOURTH.ODD
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = FOURTH.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER = FOURTH.A_TEAM_PITCHER
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fifthwinPer , 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(WINCNT / ALLHANDICNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fifthlosePer, IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1), 0) AS fifthoverPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(OVERCNT / ALLPOINTCNT * 100, 1) , 0) AS fifthunderPer, NOW() FROM (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allHandiCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIFTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) winCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIFTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT != '적특' AND FIFTH_HANDI_CAP_RESULT = '승리' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allPointCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIFTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) C ON A.A_TEAM = C.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = C.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = C.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = C.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = C.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = C.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = C.LEAGUE LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all',
GROUND,
DAY_OF_WEEK,
ODD,
A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) overCnt FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIFTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT !='적특' AND FIFTH_POINT_LINE_RESULT ='오버' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER )D ON A.A_TEAM = D.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = D.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = D.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = D.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = D.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = D.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = D.LEAGUE) FIFTH ON MATCHWIN.LEAGUE = FIFTH.LEAGUE AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM = FIFTH.A_TEAM
AND MATCHWIN.GROUND = FIFTH.GROUND
AND MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK = FIFTH.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND MATCHWIN.ODD = FIFTH.ODD
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = FIFTH.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER = FIFTH.A_TEAM_PITCHER
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(STRIKEPER / ALLMATCH * 100, 1), 0) AS strikeWinPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(STRIKEPER / ALLMATCH * 100, 1), 0) AS strikeLosePer FROM (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allMatch FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA A WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIRST_STRIKEOUT != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) strikePer FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA A WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIRST_STRIKEOUT != '적특' AND FIRST_STRIKEOUT = '승리' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE) STRIKE ON MATCHWIN.LEAGUE = STRIKE.LEAGUE AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM = STRIKE.A_TEAM
AND MATCHWIN.GROUND = STRIKE.GROUND
AND MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK = STRIKE.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND MATCHWIN.ODD = STRIKE.ODD
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = STRIKE.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER = STRIKE.A_TEAM_PITCHER
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(BASEBALLPER / ALLMATCH * 100, 1), 0)AS baseWinPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(BASEBALLPER / ALLMATCH * 100, 1), 0) AS baseLosePer FROM (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allMatch FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA A WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FRIST_BASEONBALL != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) baseBallPer FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA A WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FRIST_BASEONBALL !='적특' AND FRIST_BASEONBALL ='승리' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE) BASEBALL ON MATCHWIN.LEAGUE = BASEBALL.LEAGUE AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM = BASEBALL.A_TEAM
AND MATCHWIN.GROUND = BASEBALL.GROUND
AND MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK = BASEBALL.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND MATCHWIN.ODD = BASEBALL.ODD
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = BASEBALL.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER = BASEBALL.A_TEAM_PITCHER
LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
IFNULL(ROUND(HOMERUNPER / ALLMATCH * 100, 1), 0) AS homeRunWinPer, 100 - IFNULL(ROUND(HOMERUNPER / ALLMATCH * 100, 1), 0) AS homeRunLosePer FROM (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) allMatch FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA A WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIRST_HOMERUN != '적특' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT A.LEAGUE, A.A_TEAM,
'all',
A.GROUND,
A.DAY_OF_WEEK,
A.ODD,
A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY,
A.A_TEAM_PITCHER,
COUNT(1) homeRunPer FROM sport.BASEBALL_DATA A WHERE MATCH_DATE < DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL - 1 DAY) AND FIRST_HOMERUN != '적특' AND FIRST_HOMERUN = '승리' AND A_TEAM_TOTAL_POINT != 99 GROUP BY LEAGUE, A_TEAM,
'all'
GROUND
DAY_OF_WEEK
ODD
A_TEAM_REST_DAY
A_TEAM_PITCHER ) B ON A.A_TEAM = B.A_TEAM
AND A.GROUND = B.GROUND
AND A.DAY_OF_WEEK = B.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND A.ODD = B.ODD
AND A.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = B.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND A.A_TEAM_PITCHER = B.A_TEAM_PITCHER
AND A.LEAGUE = B.LEAGUE) HOMERUN ON MATCHWIN.LEAGUE = HOMERUN.LEAGUE AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM = HOMERUN.A_TEAM
AND MATCHWIN.GROUND = HOMERUN.GROUND
AND MATCHWIN.DAY_OF_WEEK = HOMERUN.DAY_OF_WEEK
AND MATCHWIN.ODD = HOMERUN.ODD
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY = HOMERUN.A_TEAM_REST_DAY
AND MATCHWIN.A_TEAM_PITCHER = HOMERUN.A_TEAM_PITCHER
;
mapper.update: UPDATE sport.baseball_data SET ODD = #{odd}, A_TEAM_PITCHER = IFNULL(#{aTeamPitcher},'') WHERE GAME_ID = #{gameId} AND LEAGUE = #{league} AND GROUND = #{ground} AND MATCH_DATE = #{date} AND A_TEAM = #{aTeam} AND B_TEAM = #{bTeam}
